ingredients.ingredient: 6 (1-inch thick) bone-in pork chops, at room temperature
½ cup mayonnaise, or as needed
1 pinch Cajun seasoning, or to taste

cookingTips: Bring pork chops to room temperature before cooking for even heat distribution
Use mayonnaise as a binder for the panko coating to prevent it from falling off
Cook until internal temperature reaches 145°F for safe, juicy pork
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Panko-crusted pork chops need proper moisture to stay crispy. How can you achieve a golden crust without drying out the meat?
